## ModelManager.watch() method

监听数据项

**Signature:**

```typescript
watch(model: Model, key: string | string[], operate: (m: any, k: any, ov: any, nv: any) => void, deep?: boolean): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  model | [Model](./nodom3.model.md) | 被监听model |
|  key | string \| string\[\] | 监听数据项名 |
|  operate | (m: any, k: any, ov: any, nv: any) =&gt; void | 数据项变化时执行方法 |
|  deep | boolean | _(Optional)_ 是否深度观察，如果是深度观察，则子对象更改，也会触发观察事件 |

**Returns:**

() =&gt; void

unwatch函数，执行此函数，可取消监听
